whatIsVps.question: What games can I host on Threads Host?
whatIsVps.answer: We offer hosting for a variety of popular games like Minecraft (Java & Bedrock), Rust, FiveM, SAMP, MTA, and more. If you need a server for another game, contact us and we’ll help you set it up.

ddosProtection.question: What features do your bot hosting servers have?
ddosProtection.answer: Our Bot Hosting supports Node.js, Python, and Java. We provide 24/7 uptime, database support, and full console access to manage your bot without limitations.

upgrade.question: How do I access and manage my server?
upgrade.answer: We use the Pterodactyl Panel, an intuitive and easy-to-use platform where you can start, stop, restart, and manage your server from anywhere.

ddos.question: Do you offer DDoS protection?
ddos.answer: Yes, all our plans include advanced DDoS protection to ensure your server’s stability and security at all times.

changePlan.question: Can I upgrade my plan if I need more resources?
changePlan.answer: Absolutely! If you need more RAM, CPU, or storage, you can upgrade your plan at any time without losing progress or settings.

support.question: Do you provide technical support in case of issues?
support.answer: Yes, our support team is available to help with setup, technical issues, and optimization. You can contact us via support ticket, Discord, or email.
